title: The good news and bad news as Trump seeks Ukraine deal with Putin
shortDescription: Hurtling toward talks between Zelenskyy and Putin, the days of slow-as-you-go diplomacy are clearly over in the age of Trump.

title: What we know about Trump’s rush for peace deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s rush for a Ukraine peace deal raises concerns among European leaders and President Volodymyr Zelenskyy. Here's what we know.

title: Indiana's GOP congressional leaders push redistricting as state reps meet
shortDescription: Every GOP U.S. representatives posted on X urging Statehouse Republicans to redistrict as some of them met privately to discuss President Trump's wish.

title: Zelenskyy avoids White House mauling. Will he meet with his archenemy Putin?
shortDescription: 'I think he wants to make a deal for me,' Trump was caught a saying about Russian leader Vladimir Putin. Is the next step a meeting between enemies?

title: Daily Briefing: Trump calls Putin
shortDescription: Plus: Hurricane Erin, Texas redistricting, 'Skibidi' and Bama Rush. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: Trump approval rating holds at 40%, Reuters/Ipsos poll finds
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's approval rating held at 40% in recent weeks, amid weak ratings from Hispanic voters, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll.

title: Zelenskyy brings charm, dapper look to Trump meeting
shortDescription: Zelenskyy's sartorial choice seemed carefully designed to insulate him from another unceremonious exit from the Oval Office.

title: National Guard from GOP states heading to DC: What you need to know
shortDescription: Deployments by troops from Ohio, South Carolina and West Virginia will nearly double the force that Trump has deployed amid a crackdown on crime.

title: Vibe shift: Takeaways from Zelenskyy's White House reboot with Trump
shortDescription: Zelenskyy's previous White House visit ended in acrimony. This time, both he and Trump seemed determined to avoid a public debacle.

title: DOJ to begin turning over Jeffrey Epstein probe files: GOP chairman
shortDescription: The DOJ move comes about a month after the House Oversight committee voted to approve the subpoenas in a rare bipartisan effort.

title: Who are the European leaders at Trump-Zelenskyy meeting?
shortDescription: Leaders of five European nations, plus the European Commission and NATO, are meeting with presidents Trump and Zelenskyy Aug. 18. Here's who they are.

title: Zelenskyy changed costume, Trump changed his tone for pivotal meeting
shortDescription: European leaders flocked to Washington, DC, for a critical talk with President Donald Trump on bringing an end to Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Trump, Zelenskyy meet on Ukraine peace
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said there’s a “reasonable chance” to end the war in Ukraine after talks with President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

title: Trump, Zelenskyy join EU leaders for photo
shortDescription: President Donald Trump, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and European leaders posed for a photo before peace talks on Ukraine continued.

title: Trump hosts Zelenskyy, European leaders to talk Ukraine peace efforts
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy and European leaders met with President Trump to discuss peace efforts between Russia and Ukraine on Aug. 18, 2025.

title: Zelenskyy delivers 'sensitive' letter from wife to Melania Trump
shortDescription: The International Criminal Court has indicted Vladimir Putin for the unlawful deportation and transfer of children.

title: Zelenskyy, European leaders arrive at White House
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy arrived at the White House for talks with President Trump as European leaders await expanded session.

title: See Zelenskyy rock a military-style suit in DC after Trump jab
shortDescription: See what Ukrainian President Zelenskyy wore to meet with President Trump on Aug. 18, 2025, after Trump complained about Zelenskyy’s lack of formal attire months prior.

title: Trump, Zelenskyy meet on Ukraine war
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy held high-stakes talks at the White House aimed at ending the war in Ukraine.

title: Trump targets mail-in voting again
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened an executive order to end mail-in voting before the 2026 midterms.

title: Frenemies or allies? The complicated Trump-Zelenskyy relationship explained
shortDescription: Trump’s appraisal of the Ukrainian president has been an exercise in zigzag diplomacy as their relationship has unfolded since Trump's first term.

title: States sue Trump administration over restrictions on crime victim funding
shortDescription: Democratic states want to stop the Trump administration from tying funding for crime victims to states' cooperation with immigration enforcement.

title: European leaders join Zelenskyy in DC for Trump meeting
shortDescription: European leaders traveled to Washington, D.C., for a meeting with Ukrainian President Zelenskyy and President Trump to discuss ceasefire, peace efforts.

title: Trump vows to eliminate mail-in voting before 2026 midterms
shortDescription: US President Donald Trump has denounced mail-in voting, pledging to “lead a movement” to abolish the practice ahead of the 2026 midterm elections.

title: Ukraine supporters descend on DC for Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
shortDescription: Protesters gathered near the White House on Aug. 18, 2025, in support of Ukraine.
